sources.title: 1940 Herz Geht Vor Anker ( Gustav Fröhlich, Gusti Wolf, Hilde Von Stolz, Joe Stöckel)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1940. Herz geht vor Anker.  U.a mit Gustav Fröhlich und Joe Stöckel

metadata.Plot: Sailor Fritz corresponds with several women so he won't have to look for girls when on shore leave. All are keen to marry him, and he is busy fending them off while determining that it is Lotte whom he truly loves.
metadata.Writer: Marie Luise Becker, Jacob Geis, Toni Huppertz
metadata.Actors: Gustav Fröhlich, Viktoria von Ballasko, Winnie Markus
